system.controller

Class VTKCameraController

  • java.lang.Object
    • system.model.LVSObject
      • system.controller.VTKCameraController

  • public class VTKCameraController
extends LVSObject
    This class is the controller which control the camera from VTK panel to provide function like rotation, shifting and zooming.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Andy Tsang

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VTKController getVTKController() 
      void rotate()
      Function called to rotate the object by call Azimuth() or Elevation() from VTK Camera Azimuth for Horizontal Axis Elevation for Vertical Axis
      void shift(com.leapmotion.leap.Frame frame)
      Function called to shift the image by call Yaw() or Pitch() from VTK Camera Yaw for Horizontal Axis Pitch for Vertical Axis
      void zoom()
      Function called to zoom in or out the object by call Dolly() from VTK Camera
